title: Special Swim Training
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>You-san…. I’ll be in your care…. for today. Rina-chan’s board「Bowing」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Likewise! I’m happy that you picked me as your swim training partner<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>You’re part of the swimming club…. so I thought I could have you teach me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Leave it to me! Rina-chan, can you submerge your face in water?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’m bad at it…. but I can<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ok. Then, put your face underwater, try to relax your body as much as possible and float. I’ll pull your hands along<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>O-, okay….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>It’s fine. I’ll never let go of your hands, Rina-chan, and I’m here for you no matter what happens<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I believe…. in you, You-san. So…. I’ll leave it to you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Alright, let’s do our best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
